amendment.description: Amendment stipulates that when awarding assistance to HUD-approved housing counseling agencies and/or state housing finance agencies, the Secretary may give priority consideration to entities serving areas with high rates of foreclosure.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 111-98 to stipulate that when awarding assistance to HUD-approved housing counseling agencies and/or state housing finance agencies, the Secretary may give priority consideration to entities serving areas with high rates of foreclosure.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McNerney amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
